A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was so excited for this movie and I left the theater so disappointed.  It had a little bit of everything (not in a good way) that I cannot pinpoint what I disliked so much about it.

I didn't find it funny in the parts that I was supposed to\, yet I almost laughed out loud at the Leia flying scene.  I wanted to know who Snoke was and where Rey came from...nope.  I would have liked to have seen more Phasma but she got about 1 minute screen time and died.  And what they did to Luke was a disgrace.  I read that Mark Hamill was not happy with his character in this movie and I can't fault him there.

I was really disappointed in the direction (or lack thereof) they took the newer characters.  I felt that Finn and Poe were misused in this movie.  Instead\, 2 new characters took prime screen time.  I was indifferent to Admiral Holdo herself and found it impractical that she wouldn't share her master plan with Poe.  I found the other new character\, Rose to be useless.  Even worse than that\, I found her to be more annyoing than Jar Jar Binks (yes\, really).

I don't know what JJ Abrams can do if anything to right this sinking ship.  But\, please JJ\, save us...you're our only hope!
